content: **sizing ** the pattern provides the instructions to make a child teen or adult sized hat just follow the directions where row or stitch counts are varied they should be the following dimensions this pattern possible runs a little large so if you crochet loosely perhaps use a smaller hook size circumference/diameter at crown/length child 18-18 5″ 6 25-6 5″ 7-7 25″ teen 19 5-20″ 6 5-6 75″ 6 75-7″ adult 22-22 5″ 7 5-8″ 8-8 25″ **special stitches ** the pattern uses ridging made from front post treble stitches and puff stitches to mimic metal rivets those stitches are explained
